Type.Name: Module
Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

remarks.para: A module is a single portable executable (PE) file.

block.para: One or more modules deployed as a unit composes an assembly.
For more information on modules, see Partition II of the CLI Specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .property class System.Reflection.Assembly Assembly { public hidebysig specialname instance class System.Reflection.Assembly get_Assembly() }

summary.para: Gets the appropriate assembly for the module reflected by the current instance.

value.para: A instance that reflects the assembly that contains the module reflected by the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type[] FindTypes (System.Reflection.TypeFilter filter, object filterCriteria);
.property string FullyQualifiedName { public hidebysig virtual specialname string get_FullyQualifiedName() }

summary.para: Gets a string that represents the full path of the module reflected by the current instance.

value.para:
A that represents the full path of the module reflected by the current instance. If the assembly that contains the module reflected by the current instance was loaded from a
array, the value of this string is "<Unknown>".

para.block: The case-sensitivity of the module name is implementation-specific.
Override this property to customize the content of the returned by this property in types derived from .

To obtain the name of the module without path information, use the
property.

permission.para: Requires permission to access path information. See and .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual object[] GetCustomAttributes (Type attributeType, bool inherit);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetField(string name)

Docs.param: A that specifies the name of the field to be returned.

summary.para: Returns a instance that reflects the global public field that has the specified name, and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para:
Returns a instance that reflects the global public field that has the name , and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance, if found; otherwise, returns
.

para.block: A global public field is a static field with a module-level scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetField(string name, valuetype System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr)
public virtual System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetField (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

Docs.param: A that specifies the name of the field to be returned.

param.name: bindingAttr
param.para: A bitwise combination of value that control the binding process. Specify or , or ; otherwise, this method will return .

summary.para: Returns a instance that reflects the global field that has the specified name and has the specified binding attributes, and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: Returns a instance that reflects the global field that has the name and characteristics specified by , and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance, if found; otherwise, returns .

para.block: A global field is a field with a module-level scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] GetFields()

summary.para: Returns an array whose elements reflect the global public fields that are members of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: An array of objects that reflect the global public fields that are members of the module reflected by the current instance. If no global public fields are contained in the module reflected by the current instance, returns an array with zero elements.

para.block: A global public field is a static field with a module-level scope.

summary.para: Returns an array whose elements reflect the global fields that have the specified binding attributes, and are members of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: An array objects that reflect the global fields that have the specified binding attributes, and are members of the module reflected by the current instance. If no global fields are contained in the module reflected by the current instance, returns an array with zero elements.

para.block: A global public field is a static field with a module-level scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod(string name)

Docs.param: A that specifies the name of the method to be returned.

summary.para: Returns a instance that reflects the global public method that has the specified name, and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: A instance that reflects the global public method that has the name , and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance, if found; otherwise, returns .

para.block: A global public method is a static method with a module-level scope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod(string name, class System.Type[] types)
public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod (string name, Type[] types);

Docs.param: A that specifies the name of the method to be returned.
An array of objects that contain the parameter types to search for.

summary.para: Returns a instance that reflects the global public method that has the specified name and parameter types, and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: A instance that reflects the global public method that has the name and parameter types , and is a member of the module reflected by the current instance, if found; otherwise, returns .

para.block: A global public method is a static method with a module-level scope.

exception.para: At least one element of is .

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, System.Reflection.CallingConventions callConvention, Type[] types, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers);

protected virtual System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethodImpl (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, System.Reflection.CallingConventions callConvention, Type[] types, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Reflection.MethodInfo[] GetMethods()

summary.para: Returns an array whose elements reflect the global public methods that are members of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: An array of objects that reflect the global public methods that are members of the module reflected by the current instance.

para.block: A global public method is a static method with a module-level scope.

summary.para: Returns an array whose elements reflect the global methods that have the specified binding attributes, and are members of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: An array of objects that reflect the global methods that have characteristics specified by bindingAttr, and are members of the module reflected by the current instance, if found; otherwise, returns null.

para.block: A global method is a method with a module-level scope.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
public virtual void GetPEKind (out System.Reflection.PortableExecutableKinds peKind, out System.Reflection.ImageFileMachine machine);
public virtual Type GetType (string className, bool ignoreCase);
public virtual Type GetType (string className, bool throwOnError, bool ignoreCase);
public virtual bool IsDefined (Type attributeType, bool inherit);
.property string Name { public hidebysig specialname instance string get_Name() }

summary.para: Gets a string containing the name of the module reflected by the current instance, with the path component removed.

value.para:
A containing the name of the module reflected by the current instance, with the path component removed. If the assembly that contains the module reflected by the current instance was loaded from a
array, the value of this string is "<Unknown>".

block.para: The value of this property is equivalent to the value of the string returned by the method.
Use to get the name and path of the module reflected by the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Reflection.FieldInfo ResolveField (int metadataToken, Type[] genericTypeArguments, Type[] genericMethodArguments);
public virtual System.Reflection.MemberInfo ResolveMember (int metadataToken, Type[] genericTypeArguments, Type[] genericMethodArguments);
public virtual System.Reflection.MethodBase ResolveMethod (int metadataToken, Type[] genericTypeArguments, Type[] genericMethodArguments);
public virtual Type ResolveType (int metadataToken, Type[] genericTypeArguments, Type[] genericMethodArguments);
void _Module.GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);
void _Module.GetTypeInfo (uint iTInfo, uint lcid, IntPtr ppTInfo);
void _Module.Invoke (uint dispIdMember, ref Guid riid, uint lcid, short wFlags, IntPtr pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, IntPtr puArgErr);

summary.para: Returns a string representation of the name of the module reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: A representation of the name of the module reflected by the current instance.
